nodes.text: Baron Venar was a Human male noble of Alderaan living during the Alderaan Civil War. While he was hiding in a secret hideout in the Alsakan Lowlands, Venar was blackmailed by Risha Drayen who possessed unfavorable holorecordings of his vacation on Nar Shaddaa. She sent a smuggler Captain to barter those holos in exchange for access to a House Thul spaceport.
Sometime by 3643 BBY, Venar had taken a vacation to the moon Nar Shadda. Risha Drayen would eventually come into possession of holorecordings of his trip.
